quiz.question: What does 'fragile' mean as a definition clue?
Which word fits 'the quality of being brief and to the point in writing'?
Which term means 'a word formed by blending parts of two words'?
In plain definitions, what does 'portable' mean?
Which word matches 'an expression used to praise someone lavishly'?
Which term denotes 'a word created by removing an affix from an existing word'?
A definition that mentions 'a sudden, loud noise' likely refers to which word?
Which word matches 'an authoritative list of words with definitions'?
Which linguistic term means 'the creation of a word from the sound it represents'?
If a definition says 'able to be seen', which word matches it?
Which word means 'a shortened form of a longer word or phrase'?
Which rare term means 'a word used only once in a text'?
Which feature helps narrow down a guessed word: length, part of speech, or color?
Which word fits 'a false friend: a word that looks familiar but has different meaning'?
Which linguistic term denotes 'the creation of a word by combining full words rather than parts'?
